website_summaries.verdict: Filled with some of Canon's latest technology and shooting modes, the PowerShot Elph 110 HS is a solid ultracompact camera.
pros: Canon's PowerShot Elph 110 HS is small and lightweight with a bright, ultrawide-angle lens and lots of fun shooting options, and can produce some very nice photos and movie clips
cons: The 110 HS has a relatively short battery life and mixed shooting performance, and low-light/high-ISO photos can look very soft

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought the canon sx620 hs for around 300 dollars. Though it was a good picture, I didn't think it was worth the money so I returned it and start3d looking for this camera again. I was thrilled when I found one used for 119. I needed something that shot 1080p videos, and everyone knows those are usually expensive...hence the 300 I paid for the other canon. This canon arrived in two days and looks brand New! It had the flaws mentioned but were barely noticeable! Compared to the canon sx620 hs, the elph 110 in my opinion shoots better pictures and video. Very impressed! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY LEGIT
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for about 5-6 years now and it has not let me down. I bought it for the sole use of wanting to be a YouTuber but that did not go as planned lol. Did one video and I was gone. Oh well but the pics come out great and it has a nice filter to them . Perfect for if you have a zit lol. I have dropped this camera like I dropped my ex's. It finally cracked after a couple thousand times but works like a dream. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to someone as a gift long ago, but i did use this for some time. for the price, it had good picture and video. nowadays you might be able to find something more versatile, but as far as simplicity and functionality this one works great
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Good for pictures. Not so good for long videos or continuous use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera for taking pictures. However, video only lasts for about 8 minutes, and the batteries die really quickly when taking videos. It also gets really warm when being used for that long. I bought this in May 2020 to replace my Canon ELPH 180 that I lost. That one had about 20-25 minutes of video at a time, and 2 batteries would last me the day. I am now replacing this one because it isn't meeting my needs.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSgtTeddyBear

customer_reviews.title: Camera OK but the software....
customer_reviews.text: It's really a very good camera. Best there is. The software bad. They had a very good software on the earlier models. Even though is very easy to use... is just not worth installing it. Windows utility does the same thing. I used to have a Powershot A620 and the software not only downloaded the pictures from the camera it renamed them with a more recognizable file name, like "Sandras 2010 Birthday_01", Sandras 2010 Birthday_02", etc... instead of "img987601", "img987602", etc... Believe me it makes a difference when you have more than 25 pictures to download from the camera. Or when you see the picture files on your hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold J. Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent produce, great travel camera
customer_reviews.text: I've taken a few thousand photos with this great little camera. I also have a Canon 60D, but this little one is so portable and accurate that I can't help but carry this with me on trips that I DONT want to carry a large camera. The outer protective design works great. I've dropped this camera, no damage. Very portable and slim, it fits into my pants pocket making it very convenient and much easier to use than my Galaxy S3 phone camera (which does take decent pictures). Very fast start-up, with flexible settings, this is a "no regrets" purchase. I highly recommend it. Canon is a great company building great products.
customer_reviews.author: Rob in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter, then bought one for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic camera, especially for the price. I bought if for a gift for my daughter and I kept borrowing it, so I got one for me. The pictures are great quality. Lots of cool features I have not figured out yet. My daughter uses the one that takes a black and white and then allows one color of your choice. So everything is b & W except anything blue. Very cool. The only thing I don't like and I don't know if I have the setting wrong, but there seems to be a lapse from when I press the button and the photo snaps. So action shots are tough. Also takes video. I definitely recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: LS=Loves Shopping

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite portable Canon camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite portable Canon camera. The photos this camera takes are very professional looking and the video is even better. Zoom in and out easily. The auto focus sometimes has about a 2-3 second delay on video, but while recording makes for a really professional looking artistic effect. I used this camera for video logging (vlogging), and it is so fast to use. Just hit the red video buttons and shoot. Also, very fast and easy to switch between photo and video. Easy to quickly load in battery or another memory card. Traveled all over with this compact camera with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Coty

customer_reviews.title: I had the same one that I lost so ordered one slightly used in great shape. I use it in a waterproof case ...
customer_reviews.text: I know this camera is dated now, but it's solid. I had the same one that I lost so ordered one slightly used in great shape. I use it in a waterproof case all the time when I go fishing. It takes great videos and is very easy to use. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Fishnmusicn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my daughter's birthday. We used it before we had a chance to read the instructions, but had no problem with the auto setting for all our shots. It is an amazing little camera! The pictures were quite good even in low light situations. My daughter kept making the comment, "This camera is amazing!" The shots were crystal clear and made everyone look quite good. The stabilization works great. The camera worked equally well on landscapes and night time photos of Times Square. I couldn't be happier with this purchase and neither could my 26-year-old daughter! The lime green color is too cute!! I would recommend it without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera this is our 3rd Elph Power Shot.... they are reasonably priced a take a darn good picture! Even underwater with the underwater case! Pros- Great Pictures Love underwater case accessory Love the color its never lost in my purse Cons - It has a pretty plastic like feel to it but also feels quite light.. depending on what you like... its not to to my liking though! Shutter time can be slow with certain settings or features like blink detection. I'd rather take multiple shots vs miss them... Its a bit thicker than my old Elph but wider lens and longer zoom!
customer_reviews.author: Nin Nin

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, Mighty Picture Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is perfect size to fit in my small shoulder bag. Pictures are vivid and everyone compliments the picture quality, and that's at the auto setting. With 16 mega pixels, the pictures are not grainy when blown up to poster size or used for web and brochures. I'm not sure why, but when I downloaded them to my Mac, they downloaded in random order. Could be the Mac, which seems to have a lot of idiosyncracies.
customer_reviews.author: Daisyinc

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING cam for great price omg
customer_reviews.text: So I was lookibg to spend about a hundred bucks on a new digi cam. I had decided to go to 14 mp so long as it couod do 720 p ajd had a pretty good macro mode. What I found was THIS lovely camera at almost half off (originally over two hundred). It has a BUNCH of great shooting modes and a super intuitiive + intelligent auto mode if you don't feel like customizing the shootong mode yourself. It has a GREAT macro setting, and it has 1080p, widescreen video. This takes my vlogs and product reviews to a whole new professional, movie-quality level. Awesome handcam, as all my previous Canon Poewershots jave been. <3
customer_reviews.author: Miz Valeer

customer_reviews.title: Isn't as good as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes pretty nice pictures in a wide range of conditions. The video feature seems to work pretty well too, but I don't use it very much. I'm disappointed with how long I need to press the button before the camera actually takes the picture. I haven't been able to find a setting to change this and the rating would go up if there was a way to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Road n TrailTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Solid Camera Survives Noob repair after being dropped while on
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes great pictures and movies. We dropped the camera while it was on and got a "Lens Errors", ripped it all apart and was able to push the lens back into place. I'm absolutely amazed that the "ripping" it apart didn't destroy it. I had figured we had nothing to lose trying to fix it so I wasn't as gentle/patient I could have been. I'm glad I didn't give up trying to fix it as I got the camera for 140 and they are selling now for 200. I don't believe Canon is making more of these. If you break yours it may be worth trying to fix. You'll need some P-00 and P-000 screwdrivers.
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: Problems with my Cannon PowerShot
customer_reviews.text: I received my camera without a battery. It clearly states that a battery is included in the box with all the other items that come with the camera. Amazon was no help at all and made false promises that a battery would be mailed overnight. It took about three days and the battery, although it worked, was of poor quality. I ordered, and had to pay for, a new battery. I was very disappointed with the shipment of the camera and very disappointed that Amazon was rather rude about my problem.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beaudoen

customer_reviews.title: Decent basic digital camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace my old digital elph. (It was old school and took the best macro photos!) I'm a fan of canon products and this one is, as my review title suggests: Decent basic digital camera. Nothing too fancy and all the functions are straightforward. That said, there's nothing particularly special about this camera. Sometimes the photo quality is exceptional. Other times, eh. The macro function is eh. One gripe I have with this camera is an occasional slow response time to taking a photo. Usually, I take a lot of photos, so even that problem doesn't stop me from getting the shot I want.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B Garro

customer_reviews.title: 110 manual options confusing
customer_reviews.text: I have had the camera about 3 years and still can't make sense of selecting the manual modes. The camera takes great pics on automatic but for me the manual settings are great if i fumble around and land on them but otherwise my thumb gets sore trying to find them. This is one case where the camera is smarter than I. Looking for point & shoot whose manual options are easier to find. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Sky Sox Wiz

customer_reviews.title: A great Christmas gift for my mother.
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. I love it. This camera is easy to use, 20x zoom, shoots in HD... Even the 20x zoom is crystal clear... that I was shocked about. I'm going to be getting one for myself soon. I prefer this one over the updated model as the updated ELPH is a touch screen... this model has a few basic buttons and is very simple to use. So far, so good. Cannon, you've done a great job with this model. It's cheap, beautiful and the LCD screen is huge in my opinion. More than large enough to enjoy the photos you've taken.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: Getting hard to find, worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so conveniently small and simple to use that I have completely abandoned my EOS Rebel DSLR. I've been at locations where I've shot with both cameras, and the ELPH 110 takes much sharper, better pictures, so why carry the extra baggage? I've even started taking it with me to libraries instead of my hand-held scanner--it's smaller, the battery lasts longer, and I can instantly see my documents in high detail. The video capability is very impressive for such a small camera. The only flaw: when using the zoom feature while taking video, a humming noise is recorded on the video soundtrack.
customer_reviews.author: SKinnell

customer_reviews.title: wanted a small camera
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a small camera, she could carry around and take pictures and videos with. I have pretty-much always been a fan for Canon Products. Setting it up for her and playing with it a bit, I was impressed a lot of it's features. Excellent wide angle coverage and big viewing screen on back. I have the new 5Ti and vanity aside, this ELPH would be as good for most of my picture taking excursions. Dragging the bulky bigger Canon can discourage outtings where a camera should be in attendance.
customer_reviews.author: Bisko

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the mail a week quicker than it said.I got not one, but two wrist straps that had originally been missing from the order. I only wish the warnings had stated the scratches were on the screen instead of being vaguely noted. That's the only reason for the lack of being five stars. Overall, happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Love Canon PowerShot ELPH's
customer_reviews.text: We recently lost our 6 year old ELPH on vacation and bought this as a replacement. So far I'm happy with our purchase. It's close enough to our old camera so as not to relearn how it works. Pricing was the best that I found online. It was out of stock but shipped by the date indicated. Very happy with the pricing and shipping. The camera is very nice looking. It takes a little longer for the camera to actually take the picture but that may be due to the higher megapixels, not sure. I'll report back once I've used it more but so far I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to Jays

customer_reviews.title: upgrade to 1080p hd
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from Powershot 5600 (720p hd) video capability to 1080p hd with this ELPH 110 HS. I take a lot of videos and post to youtube.com and wanted the best video quality possible. this camera also takes great pictures. can't beat it for $119 shipped free. i've been buying canon cameras every 2 to 3 years....not becuase they wear out but becuase technilogy keeps advancing quickly....amazing thing is each camera ends up costing $119...lets face it, no camera phone takes good pictures and videos like these babies.
customer_reviews.author: J. David Bell

customer_reviews.title: Cannon does make usefull digital cameras
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for another digital camera to replace my "older" one which now is about ten years old. I based my decision on Consumer Reports reviews of this camera and decided that it would fill my needs. My only objection is when I tried to "thread" the hand "sling" through the place where it goes, it was very "frustrating". After many unsuccessful attempts, I finally succeeded. It did arrive well packed and in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Vielbig

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I will buy again from this merchant. Further, and very important. Think Green, Please protect animals and plants, recycle everything you can, no littering and use it enough to completely finish any product. Transmit this message to others. Compraré nuevamente en este negocio. adicionalmente, Piensa Verde, por favor protege a los animales y las plantas, recicla todo lo que puedas, no echar basura, usa todo hasta el final, transmite este mensaje a otros.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Photo Quality, Wonderful Wide Angle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. It captures excellent color and clarity and it does it all with a great wide angle. But even with the wide angle, you can get close ups done well too. I took some nice pictures of the wife up close and it was great. But I feel where this camera shines is in its ability to capture scenic vistas or situations where you need a lot if information in the photo - I also use it for an around town blog that I have and the picture quality is just extraordinary. It fits neatly into a shirt pocket too. A great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: Better pictures than Lumix DMC-LX7
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this from a Canon SD980 IS, and then attempted to upgrade to the much-revered Panasonic Lumix DMC-LX7. Well, simply put, the images from this camera was better, and I decided to sell the Lumix. I went through close to 20 digital cameras, and I have to say that Canons rule in the compact world. They get the color, value, features, and interface just right. You will absolutely not regret getting this camera.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Canon rocks my socks off. I have tried other camera's by other companies and they work, but none work to the clarity and amazing easiness as this little guy. I could throw a bunch of camera terminology at you, but I don't really know it. I know it takes awesome photos, it takes pictures quickly (no saying Cheese and waiting another 5-10 seconds for the camera to work), and it's super easy to go back and look at the pictures on your camera or load them onto a computer. And, it fits in my pocket. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent point and shoot pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: I always seem to come back to Canon, and probably always will when it comes to small pocket cameras. Don't let this cameras small size and mostly full auto features keep you away, the image quality, especially in natural light, is quite impressive. This is a great camera to throw in your pocket and have at the ready any time you want to snap a quick picture, with quality that will far surpass your average smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: T.R. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera
customer_reviews.text: The best part about this product is its 24mm wide angle. Probably one of the most accurate exposure P&S I've used. Decent(not perfect) flash photo indoor... better flash quality than most P&S I've used/tested. Only two complaints... 1) Shutter lags a bit (extra 3 to 5 seconds or so and that is a bit long) to use flash back to back, and 2) the price at $229 is a bit steep compared to other competitor models (<$200) but I am happy with the extra I paid for the wide angle and Canon built quality.
customer_reviews.author: wlee

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera shoots very nice pictures. The zoom works very nicely. I especially like that this camera has a battery that charges. I bought this for my daughter and like the concept of the charging battery, so I asked for a camera also. My camera was bought at Costco. I got the camera, memory card and a carrying case for the same money that I spent on Amazon. Although at Amazon, I was able to pick a color. So read carefully--the memory card is NOT included. I had missed that, but again the camera takes very nice pictures.
customer_reviews.author: S.. E.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a camera I can carry with me.
customer_reviews.text: This does the job for me. I've been looking to buy a smaller lighter digital camera and finally settled on the ELPH 110 HS. I couldn't be happier. In a small padded case it is in my coat pocket, always ready to go. The bright red case makes it easy to spot so I don't tend to forget where I put it, and it does everything I want, (and probably more) with no fuss. Very pleased. The screen is large & bright, the zoom control surrounds the exposure release, and it takes great photos in Auto mode. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: ChevyGuy

customer_reviews.title: It takes great pictures.... sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th cannon powershot. Seems to take a much longer time to focus than any of the previous models we had. When taking HD movies, it seems fall in and out of focus for no reason. It takes great night and low light shots though. It was dropped hard and quit working soon after we got it, but was able to get it working again with a combination of pliers, hammer, and luck. It has been working fine now for the past 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've read the other reviews and while I admit I'm not one of those people who know everything about cameras, this camera is great! The flash is excellent. Pictures taken in low light come out clear as day. I've taken some where the TV is on in the background and you can actually see what's on. My one complaint is the computer software that comes with it can be difficult to work and understand and half the photos I try to upload to Facebook from the program fail with no explanation. But the camera itself works great. My husband even dropped it (the battery popped out and everything) and it still works fine!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Point & Shoot Camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who is an exchange student in Japan. He has taken some amazing pictures with it. It is small and easy to carry around with him, the battery life is good and the picture quality is great. Being a teenager, he loves to use all the special effects and take lots of videos. The slow motion video is one of his favorite things. He has made some great vlog posts about his trip from videos he took on the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Indybug

customer_reviews.title: Missing charger
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing and it taked fantastic photos and videos. However, the camera was shipped without the battery charger and it was dented on the front (works perfectly fine just not appealing) I will change my rating if I recieve the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Meg M

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot- glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: The colors were beautiful, I am not a professional photographer, but have several expensive cameras. This worked well, it recycled a little slow when taking the 2nd shot, even with a fast SD card, but maybe the card was to blame. We took ocean photos that were true blue and turquoise, and really clear. It is small, perfect for pocket and hiking. I am glad I read others reviews and bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zombie Prepper

customer_reviews.title: Solid and small
customer_reviews.text: The Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS is a solid point and shoot camera. I took one star off because the circular navigation buttons on the back can be hard to use if you have large hands. Overall, it's a solid value with a lot of features and it takes great pictures. I'm quite happy. Pros: Crystal clear photos Large display for taking great photos Lots of presets to choose Small, but solid Cons: The circular navigation buttons can be hard to use if you have large hands
customer_reviews.author: William K

customer_reviews.title: Vlogger Life
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera it is great quality. I am a vlogger, and I didn’t want to have to carry around my expensive one. This is light and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this camera.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my wife for Mother's Day last year. She is not into complicated technical products so this camera, with the option to use the automatic settings or the manual settings was just right for her. She has entered photographs she has taken with her camera in local contests and recently won "Best in Show". I also like the movie function. I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Takes amazing pictures...
customer_reviews.text: I did some real research before purchasing this camera as a gift. I use a Canon 20D and know a bit about cameras and functions. Having an easy to use camera was important to me and this was perfect. It takes great pictures (amazing in fact) and is easy to use to download and share. There are many functions and it has held up perfectly. I would highly recommend it (in fact I want to repalce my point-n-shoot for when I can't carry my big camera)... I may have to buy one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Eckels

customer_reviews.title: Point & Shoot?  No, Point & Pray!
customer_reviews.text: Cam arrived, intact, well packed, and is as advertised. Great little pocket cam (had to pay extra for red color - why?). And, still, Canon idiotically refuses to put any kind of viewfinder on their point&shoot cams. Should be called point&pray. Try using it in sunlight! I live in AZ. Get the picture? I don't... at least not on the LCD monitor. Otherwise, terrific small cam to carry for everyday use. Put a tiny viewfinder on it and it would be 5 stars. PS: Great HD video!
customer_reviews.author: Larry KJ

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT QUALITY CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this camera, and I took a few photos with it and I love how it auto adjusts to the surrounding backgrounds! The only thing I have to say is that the circular navigation buttons (on the back) looks a little a bit out-dated for my taste. I also tried the video quality..it pretty good but the sound quality is a bit low. I love how this camera also comes in several colors which can suit anyone! Its also pretty small and compact which is perfect for traveling! Overall, its a pretty good camera and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has not let us down since the day we got it. It takes incredible quality pictures and its sleek and slim design makes it easy to pack around for events or travelling. For years my husband insisted on packing around his huge and time consuming (changing lens) DSLR camera. Because of the great picture quality this camera takes.. He hasn't used his professional camera in over a year..
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon shipping was fast! So far the camera has met my expectations. Easy to understand user interface and the picture quality is about what I expected.The auto feature takes really good photos and the ease with which you can take great shots is about par with most upper level quality point and shoot cameras. If you need an easy to use, quality point and shoot camera that fits right into a jacket or cargo pocket, this is a great choice. To sum it up, small camera that has better than average quality photo quality. You want to take pics with your iPhone, go ahead. If you want to take better pics than that, use this nifty camera instead.
customer_reviews.author: John Jason Gulley

customer_reviews.title: Satisified with Camera
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at this camera for quite a few months before deciding to purchase it. I had looked at several reviews on Amazon and other places and finally decided to make the purchase. For me, the size is convenient and has enough features for my use. I am not a professional and don't take a lot of pictures, but I like to have more than I need with certain electronics. The software with it is very useful in regards to pictures I already have on my computers.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mosby

customer_reviews.title: Great value, make sure you pick up a separate memory card!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for the casual user for the money! Make sure and pickup a separate memory card when you purchase the camera so you can use it right out of the box. I saw some other reviews that were not happy about this, it didn't bother me because the tiny little cards that come with most cameras are a joke anyway. Bright, large screen for viewing, easy to use menu. This may not be enough camera with enough control for an advanced user but great for anyone under that skill level!
customer_reviews.author: Vallynn

customer_reviews.title: This camera is highway robbery - for the buyer, for once!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace an SD990 IS that my wife managed to, uh, not come home from school with. (thieving little students!) While that camera wasn't all that old, I'm impressed at the improvement in the quality of pictures between the two. This takes much better low light pictures, and has a much more responsive shutter button. For this price, this thing is an absolute steal.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rathbun

customer_reviews.title: Slooooooooowest camera ever.
customer_reviews.text: Great optics, but extremely slow shudder! Do not buy this if you want to capture a toddler... Or any othe living thing, for that matter. Maybe a tree sloth. Really, I've never had a slower shutter on a camera. Very shocking for one of this quality. The lenses and screen were good though. And it was intelligent with faces and scenes. Biggest bust? And this might be just bad luck, but the screen on ours stopped working after just a few months :(
customer_reviews.author: Chef Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My husband dropped my Canon ELPH630 and, well, that was the end of it! Not a problem though as I had been desiring a new point and shoot with more megapixels. After reading reviews and seeing the price, this was just what I wanted. It is FAR superior to my old Canon! The auto setting is wonderful....don't even need to set the macro manually for closeups. Not one picture has come out blurry even with my shaking hands. I LOVE this simple camera!
customer_reviews.author: Lee WagarTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: ☆ミ
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in perfect condition, exactly as described, on time. Quality pictures and videos; very crisp images for such a small camera. I love the fact that it's small and light, making it a great choice for trips without taking up too much space or having to sacrifice quality. It's been 2 years with no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maraschino

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I've had several Canon PowerShot ELPHs over the years, in different series. My daughter took my last camera with her to college, and I wanted a new one for the upcoming holidays. I've always liked these Canon cameras, so I looked at what was available, and their prices. I think this one is my favorite of them all. Light-weight, easy to hold, simple to use, AND . . . it takes great pictures, which is really what I'm after. The downside? My daughter used it at Christmas, and loved it! I had to say "no," I'm keeping THIS one!
customer_reviews.author: Averagemom

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big Nikon fan. I only by Nikon cameras. I was looking for a waterproof camera to bring with me when snorkeling. I tried many waterproff rugged cameras from Olympus, Panasonic, etc. but all have failed me. Then Nikon came out with thier own waterproof camera, yippee! But that failed me as well. So i decided to go with the waterproff housing route and it worked out great. This little camera works great on it's own but use it with the Waterproof housing, you have a great waterproof camera! I highly recommend this to anyone on a budget looking for a good compact camera. Add the waterproof housing and you can take it in the water as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Bzt

customer_reviews.title: I love the fast refresh and can snap lots of shots quickly
customer_reviews.text: I am a canon powershot fan. This is my third one over the years and have loved them all without any problems. I chose this one because I wanted to be able to shoot quickly in nature and not miss a shot. WIthout the flash the refresh is amazing. I can set it on continuous shoot or single shoot for a shutter not so sensitive. It take really good shots and even smaller than my last one and thin and light. If you want a small great camera, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Fun size camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera so that my husband and I would each have a camera. We have a Canon Rebel which is the best but I purchased the powershot for my pocket because my husband doesn't share the Rebel very well on vacations plus it is a bulky camera compared to the powershot. This camera is fun to play with, just point and shoot and is pocket size. The pictures are of decent quality but does not compare to the quality of the Rebel. I would recommend this camera just becasue it's fun and little but if you want really high quality pictures invest in a Canon Rebel.
customer_reviews.author: Farmgirl

customer_reviews.title: This is a good camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for six months now and it takes excellent pictures I want to get another soon! I do plan in the future to purchase another battery because the battery does go down fast if you are taking alot of pictures at one time like I do if I go somewhere so a back-up battery is necessary for me. It takes very good quality videos as well. I have dropped the camera many times, no damage execpt for I dropped it on rocks and cracked the screen. I would recommend this to any body looking for a good point-and-shoot
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera a lot. It takes great pictures and good HD video... The bad is the batteries. They do not last well. When using this camera for a full day I like to bring 5 charged batteries with me. I like the Wasabi batteries the best, they seem to last longer then the canon battery that came with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bill & Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable for the price
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around and read reviews for several days before settling on this camera. If you're looking for a point and shoot with great results, this is it. I've added some sample shots of my own, all pictures taken with no flash. Really, this camera is great. Great functions/settings and even the auto option works well enough in good lighting. Low light is pretty decent for this little camera, and it has settings to help with that
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes very good pictures for a point and shoot camera. I sold the first one I owned and missed it so much that I bought another one. It is the perfect camera to put in your purse and pocket to take pictures on a moments notice. It also takes 1080p video. It is a shame that Canon discontinued this model since its successor only has 720p video. Buy one if you can find it at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Borocay

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great camera! Order extra battery
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical buying a used camera, thinking that there had to be some sort of catch. But I LOVE this camera! The pictures are a bit too clear with the face, really enhancing it(so it sucks if you have blemishes) but it's awesome! The sound is decent, and it's a very "new" looking camera. The only down fall is the battery life isn't too great.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my wife as she was goin away on business and needed something small, yet good quality. The camera takes clear shots and the zoom is fantastic. I recommend getting a small tripod to hold the camera with and then take shots on the timer. You cannot go wrong with this model as it is light and easy to use plus has settings that are easy to understand with clear pictures as a result!
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery but excellent images
customer_reviews.text: The battery drains quickly but may have been due to cold weather. Really like the nighttime scene. Used available light in the evening to get shots that I could not get with my previous camera. Cannot figure out the "P" scene as there are no selection attributes. Like the size of the camera, easy to carry and hold. Wide angle lens is good. Fun camera. Considering buying a second battery.
customer_reviews.author: E. Shipman

customer_reviews.title: Wide angle lens = great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Lightweight, slim and pretty good video quality - wide angle lens so if you needed to take videos of yourself, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I had the same camara which I received as a gift 4 years ago. I loved that camara and even though there was nothing wrong with it, I wanted to update. This new model is sleek and light and it takes a great clear shot! I recommend it for people like me who are not into the big fancy camaras, but likes to take pictures that are clear and bright! This is a uncomplicated camara and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great P&S camera that takes outstanding macro shots!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this camera. Carried it all over the world with me last year. Looked to buy another one before this one's warranty ran out, but now they are more expensive than when I bought this one? Shot times are slow with flash, it takes a while to lock on or charge so forget trying to get quick, action shots with this one. At least not with flash. Otherwise it's acceptable. Awesome video too!!
customer_reviews.author: TRJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love Canon products, and this little digital guy is awesome. It's not too expensive, but takes quality pictures and has a lot of settings to choose from. Every now and again, it doesn't seem to want to focus properly in certain lightings, but overall it's a great digital camera for someone (like me) who wants a good camera to capture everyday life but isn't necessarily making a career out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Martin

customer_reviews.title: Canon still makes awesome cameras
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Canon PowerShot camera and they just keep getting better. This takes high quality shots in both manual and auto modes and allows you to have a lot of flexibility in manual mode. The reason I gave 4 stars and not 5 is the reason I had to buy this camera. Canon's Elph cameras have a problem of breaking if the lens is justled or dropped when extended. This cannot be fixed for a reasonable price. Despite this issue, I still bought a new Powershot Elph because I love the pictures it takes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for a snap shot
customer_reviews.text: These refurbished cameras are like new, maybe they are new. They come with USB cable, charger, battery, strap, and CD-Rom. The camera is so much better than most of the newer models. Some features like HDR or automatic panorama are missing but you cannot have it all. The biggest drawback is that the camera struggles a lot with high contrast scenes (shadow and sun). The biggest plus is that the automatic mode really works and you can take real snapshots. Also the video quality is excellent. Some other cameras have Full HD but are not capable of dealing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tomtom

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.. (I still use my phones camera more)
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap camera, although if you have an iPhone 6 or newer I would advise you to simply use that and save your money. It's exactly the same quality as my iPhone. Also buy another battery and charger because the battery runs out pretty fast. Overall it was an alright purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Love my camera
customer_reviews.text: Love my camera. Loved it so much we now have 2 of them. Very small and compact but the wide screen photography and video is better than my HD video camera I have. Batteries are generally long lasting for this unless your doing a lot of video recording so having back up batteries is a good thing to have.
customer_reviews.author: Mystipul Rakkastaja

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: First, the only complaint I have is where the flash is placed. Super annoying to have to remember "the flash will come out of here, move your finger." But aside from that, great camera. Zoom is incredible. Crisp video and pictures. My wife specifically asked for this camera, and her mom bought one as well based on my wife's recommendations (props where they are deserved), glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Brooding

customer_reviews.title: Durabale Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my wife. This is a pretty decent camera. All I could say is that my wife is perfectly satisfied with this camera. It's pretty handy and durable. She dropped it a couple of times but it is still working. This camera is worth the money you spend.
customer_reviews.author: RM TUCK

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I have taken a lot of photos with my phone camera, but I definitely pull this out when I want to take a real photo, as there is no comparison. The various modes are a little tricky to get to. I actually get lost in the amount of options this camera gives me, but I love that. Great camera
customer_reviews.author: Starcrescendo

customer_reviews.title: They Get Better and Better!
customer_reviews.text: This is the fifth Canon compact digital camera I have purchased. Each one is significantly better than the previous one. With a 32 Gig chip I can now do HD video and take all the photos I want on a two week vacation and never worry about running out of storage space. The images are razor sharp. I will have no need for a camera any better than this. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera as a vogging camera everyday on YouTube! It does 1080P and has no issues at all, and it gets thrown around in my bag all of the time. I've had it almost a year now. I love it! If you want to see the great quality it does search for danielxmiller on YouTube, my vlogging videos I use this camera. My professional videos I use a Sony NEX-5N. But that is too big to carry around, so I got this amazing little guy. It does 24 FPS which is great for regular videos.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Miller

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new ELPH camera. We have a new baby granddaughter, our first, so naturally I want to take pics of her whenever we see her. The quality has been great and when taking them in less lit areas, I now get a good photo! I am a person who takes a lot of pics whether it be family, holidays, vacations, etc. so the performance of the camera is very important to me. Would I personally recommend this camera to others...definitely yes.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Canon
customer_reviews.text: This is a great easy to use point and shoot camera. We also own a Canon 60d as well as a Canon Rebel. I like how stream line and small the ELPH 110 is. It takes clear photos with no fuss. When I need a quick and easy shot I use it or my I phone. No complaints. Worth the price. The black is classic and my number one pick. I would recommend it as a quick shot for any beginner or professional photographer.
customer_reviews.author: Directors Wife

customer_reviews.title: The palm sized replacement for a full sized SLR
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my mother who loves to traval to graduations, weddings, and performances of her grandchildren. She has a full sized Nikon with multiple lenses, but found it cumbersome, especially when traveling. She wanted the same quality of photo, but in a size she could put into a pocket, or purse. This small versatel camera has fulfilled that need, and has surpassed every expectation ... It is one fantastic camera.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Mueller

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best point and shoot cameras on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best point and shoot cameras on the market. Totally worth the price tag. Takes fantastic pictures, and in some comparisons, is rated better than DSLRs!!!
customer_reviews.author: MDLamb

customer_reviews.title: This is an exceptional camera for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The Elph 110 HS has cool creative shooting modes. It also has slow-sync flash. It is a lot of fun. I have been shooting photography since the 80's, the auto focus is the biggest problem on cameras under $500, this one has a pretty good auto focus, I was suprised. The color is awesome. The digital zoom is pretty clean and it fosuses ok digitally zoomed. I have had trouble with this on other cameras. The buttons are small though, thats going to be true on any camera this size I guess. I can tell you that this camera absolutely blows away my Nikon L 120. I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: johnvenrick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little camera
customer_reviews.text: A birthday gift for my hubby, so he could take pictures and video during the Moab Trail Marathon. The picture and video quality are fantastic, and the camera is small enough to tuck in a pocket. It's easy to carry and operate while in motion and the stability feature is the bomb! After seeing the photos and video from our trip, my Dad was so impressed he ordered one. :-)
customer_reviews.author: lucky dog

customer_reviews.title: Great Photos
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing point and shoot camera. First of all, the color is fantastic. Aside from color the photos are great. I have many of the photos taken with this camera hanging on my wall and I always get compliments on the photos. Anyone looking for a point and shoot - this is your camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm86

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was bought as a Christmas present for my "technology-challenged" mom. As a result, it was very important to find a camera that was easy to use - the buttons are easy to see, big enough to press/turn for arthritic hands, large screen to for viewing, and intuitive usage for the standard "point-and-click" camera to give clear, fantastic photos. It is a vibrant red, compact and durable. My mom was thrilled to receive this little camera - definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an easy point and shoot camera and was astounded by its capabilities. The extensive manual (over 200 pages) was a surprise. I have taken many pictures of families. I had trouble transferring pictures from the camera to my PC. It seems that the procedure was outdated in the manual and did not work. I finally was able to make the transfers after much trrouble.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Van

customer_reviews.title: Love it, as I always do with Canon
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this for a point and shoot to anybody. Great price for what it has to offer! This does not feel as strong as my previous Canon (which I ironically broke the lense on when I dropped) but still very sturdy, for as thin as it is. The screen is definitely big enough and clear as day. I love almost everything about it but if I had to pick out something to pick on, I would say the low-light shots are not the best. All in all, if this is in your price range, get it:D
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my wife mainly for travel, and we used it for the first time at our family gathering for Christmas. I am impressed with the sharp photos and the ability of the 110 to account for the problems of bright light from a window behind a human subject. The auto feature does a fine job of deciding when to use flash. Coupled with the case we got from Case Logic, the camera seems secure and extremely portable. I am not a fan of LCD as the only way to frame a photo, but the screen on this camera is wonderfully bright, and I am expecting that it will work just fine outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Vancil

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product, GREAT pictures
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my husband, who kept taking and using MY Canon PowerShot. My husband is a die-hard Sony-lover, but after he gave me my PowerShot for my birthday, he was totally hooked on it. The quality of the pictures is amazing and the camera is fairly easy to use. Plus, it's durable - I've dropped mine a few times and it hasn't gotten damaged at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and great item do far! I will update periodically. Lightweight, simple to use, loads of features and enhancements! The price of the item you get a great camera quality and not to mention full HD function which is an ideal feature from this camera It would be nice to be able change aperture and shutter speed, but hopefully one day they'll introduce this function for point for point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Chung

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly the one she wanted!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter requested this item for Christmas. She uses it to make videos and is very happy with it,
customer_reviews.author: GrammieSue

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I like using this camera with the flash off. This camera is perfect for family get-togethers where you want to take a whole bunch of pictures without the flash annoying people. The pictures come out beautifully. Following the advice in other reviews, I turned the "auto" feature off. It creates a delay when you snap the picture. I took it on a trip to Italy and got some truly amazing photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Speedy! Larger, much higher resolution LCD than in my Canon PowerShot ELPH 1300IS. Takes terrific images. Blue skies are really blue, even when I snap a photo from a shady place. For me, image quality is the main factor I consider when shopping for a camera in my price range. Cons: Ergonomically inferior to, for example, the Canon PowerShot ELPH 1300IS. I wish the edges of the camera weren't so square. Has a cheap feel to it. This camera makes it more cumbersome to delete an image. It requires more steps.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Burwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Camera takes nice pictures and has easy features to use. The size fits well into my hand. If you are using a mount you can't access the SD card so make sure you have the battery and card in before mounting the camera, just a small annoyance. Some pictures are blurry, but when you get a good picture, they look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: SkIan

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I decided to buy this one. I had looked at several small cameras, and finally decided this one has all the features I want and it's very easy to use. The quality of my photos is just amazing! I'd recommend this one to any one interested in taking great quality photos with a very small, compact and easy to transport camera. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Deedy

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I had an Olympus that I never did really like. There was a bright spot that showed up on all the images. I asked my friends on FB what kind of camera they would buy--99% said a Canon. I chose this camera for its simplicity but it takes a great picture. And...if I really want to I can make some adjustments. Frankly though, the auto everything option works extremely well. I got a big fat 16 GB card for taking videos and it never gets full.
customer_reviews.author: Buys Quality

customer_reviews.title: I'm Happy So Far - Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it two days, but so far am very satisfied. I've taken several test pictures indoor hand held without a flash in different levels of lighting with and without zoom. I'm well satisfied with the clarity. I wanted a point and shoot camera that would take good pictures in a variety of lighting situations. It does what I wanted it to do. There are a number of manual settings, but I haven't done any checking on that.
customer_reviews.author: Art Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: among the best of the pocket cameras
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Easy to use, reliably good image quality. Fits in any pocket. I'm very happy with it. The bad: older Elph cameras had bigger batteries that lasted longer. This one has such a tiny battery that doesn't last very long per charge. I'd rather a slightly larger camera with a longer-lasting battery. Loses one star for this.
customer_reviews.author: PacNW

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact camera
customer_reviews.text: I usually use a Canon 7d for photos but that can be a tad bulky at times. Was in the need for a pocket sized camera and this is perfect for that. Quality of the photos are really crisp. Very easy to use and has so e great features. Battery life is decent but I got the extra battery anyway. Great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: tmac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my last trip to the beach!
customer_reviews.text: The combination of this camera and the waterproof housing (Canon WP-DC330L) works perfect! The camera takes great photos and the case works perfect in the water (and makes the camera to float). All the controls of the camera can be used with the case on. It was cheaper that buying a waterproof camera and, according with other reviews, the camera takes better photos.
customer_reviews.author: Just An Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I had researched cameras because I wanted to do youtube videos of myself performing songs and playing guitar. This one was recommended. It is High Def 1920 and the videos came out awesome. When using my own mic and sound system to perform my music the sound came out great. Thanks Cannon.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N.

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS 16.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom 24mm Wide-Angle Lens and 1080p Full HD Video Recording (Blue)
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe Canon 6045B001 PowerShot ELPH 110 HS 16.1MP Compact Digital Camera, in blue, is slim and curvy and a natural fit for your hand. Easy operability and reliable high-quality performance are reason enough to carry it everywhere, but you will also love the attention-getting quality of the camera's distinctly sophisticated modern design. The matte finish projects your taste and style like a fashion accessory, but the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS has its serious side too. A 16.1 Megapixel high-sensitivity sensor plus Canon's DIGIC 5 Image Processor deliver impeccable image quality and high-performance features never before possible. Experience the Face ID feature that recognizes and optimizes images of your friends and family, Intelligent IS that creates sharp, steady shots in a wide variety of situations, and stunning Full HD Video. Smart AUTO lives up to its name, letting you shoot anywhere, anytime as the mood strikes, confident that the camera will automatically make your images the best they can be.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 Canon PowerShot ELPH 110 HS Style, Sophistication, and Power

Slim and curvy, the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS is a natural fit for your hand. Easy operability and reliable high-quality performance are reason enough to carry it everywhere, but you’ll also love the attention-getting quality of the camera’s distinctly sophisticated modern design. The matte finish in a wide range of vivid, highly expressive colors projects your taste and style like a fashion accessory, but the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS has its serious side, too. A 16.1 Megapixel high-sensitivity sensor plus Canon’s DIGIC 5 Image Processor deliver impeccable image quality and high-performance features never before possible. Experience Face ID that recognizes and optimizes images of your friends and family, Intelligent IS that creates sharp, steady shots in a wide variety of situations, and stunning Full HD Video. Smart AUTO lives up to its name, letting you shoot anywhere, anytime as the mood strikes, confident that the camera will automatically make your images the best they can be. 

Canon HS SYSTEM 
The Canon HS SYSTEM lets you take bright, clear photos in an even wider range of shooting situations. Beautiful low-light shots are possible with minimal noise and maximum detail in highlight and shadow areas. The system is the result of two technologies brought together in PowerShot cameras: a high-sensitivity imaging sensor, which is able to capture more light; and the DIGIC Image Processor, which actively reduces noise with high-speed image processing. The 16.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor in the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS digital camera incorporates advanced light reception technology that enhances sensitivity. The DIGIC 5 Image Processor provides a major boost in noise reduction, expanding the usable ISO range to an amazing high of ISO 3200. The Canon HS SYSTEM takes the frustration out of low-light shooting, delivering clear, blur-free images.

Canon DIGIC 5 Image Processor 
The latest-generation Canon DIGIC 5 Image Processor brings phenomenal increases in processing speed and power. Improved chip architecture and algorithms deliver greatly expanded functionality with further refinement in image quality. Improved noise reduction produces clearer images when shooting in low light at high ISO speeds. Enhanced i-Contrast performance adjusts differences between light and dark areas to achieve even more natural-looking results. The faster processing speed also results in faster continuous shooting capability while maintaining full image quality. The DIGIC 5 Image Processor also makes possible a new, highly advanced automatic white balance system. Whereas conventional white balance makes an overall adjustment based on a single type of light source, the new Canon Multi-Area White Balance analyzes several areas of the image to determine whether different adjustments are needed, for example, for the main subject and the background. 

Canon Full HD Video Advantage
In addition to the Canon HS SYSTEM, the combination of the advanced CMOS sensor and DIGIC 5 Image Processor in the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS makes it possible to shoot crisp, clear high definition video. Imagine the fun and excitement of being able to shoot spectacular 1080p Full HD video that you can later watch on your HDTV or download to your computer to share with family and friends. In addition to being able to shoot Full HD 1080p video at 24* frames per second, the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS can also shoot 720p HD video at 30** frames per second.

*Actual frame rate is 23.976 fps.
**Actual frame rate is 29.97 fps.

Dedicated Movie Button and Optical Zoom for Easy Video Capture
It’s never been easier to shoot videos with a PowerShot digital camera. The PowerShot ELPH 110 HS has a dedicated movie button that lets you start and stop recording instantly. There is no need to go through layers of menus or operate switches or dials to switch to and from video recording mode. The camera is always ready to shoot stills or video whenever you want. And unlike less sophisticated point-and-shoot cameras, the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS lets you use the full range of optical zoom when you’re shooting a video.

HDTV Playback via HDMI with CEC Support
It’s easy to enjoy and share the videos you shoot with the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS digital camera. Simply connect its HDMI terminal to your HDTV using an HDMI cable. And because the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS supports HDMI-CEC technology, you’ll be able to control the playback of your images and videos on any CEC-enabled HDTV using the TV’s remote control. (CEC—Consumer Electronic Control—is part of the HDMI specification, enabling components in a system to communicate with one another.)


iFrame
With the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS, you can also shoot video in the Apple iFrame format, which is a computer-friendly standard that speeds up importing and editing of videos. It keeps file sizes small, making it more convenient to upload or e-mail high-quality videos. The iFrame format enjoys native support in compatible Mac and Windows video applications, making it unnecessary to perform time-consuming and often quality-degrading conversions.

Give Your Images a Whole New Perspective 
5x Optical Zoom with 24mm Wide-Angle Lens
Photographers who look for new ways to put excitement into their images will love the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS’s 24mm Wide-Angle lens. It captures both depth and expanse to give photos a real sense of scale. Landscapes, group photos, city shots and more all benefit from the extra room the wide-angle lens affords, and the added expanse gives you more to work with in every frame. The 5x Optical Zoom puts real zooming power in your hands—a rarity in a camera this slim and chic. Images are bright and steady all along the zoom, so feel free to get in close and pull back as your creativity dictates. It also incorporates the latest in Canon UA lens technology, suppressing lens aberration for outstanding image quality throughout the entire zoom range.


UA Lens Technology
Pioneered by Canon, UA Lens technology makes possible compact lenses with remarkable optical performance. By using molded glass with an ultra-high refractive index in aspherical lens elements, Canon has succeeded in reducing lens size while significantly reducing image aberrations. Another stellar example of cutting-edge Canon optics, UA Lens technology helps make PowerShot digital cameras pocket-friendly and capable of astounding image quality.

PureColor System LCD
The PowerShot ELPH 110 HS digital camera’s large and bright 3.0-inch PureColor LCD screen makes it easy to view and frame your shots in high resolution (461,000 dots). Many LCD screens on the market today use a striped arrangement of dots that works great for text and menus, but is not ideal for imagery. The PowerShot ELPH 110 HS digital camera’s PureColor System LCD uses a delta arrangement of dots, an arrangement that works better for the organic nature of photos and videos, allowing you to review your images with exceptional clarity with rich, true-to-life color. Moreover, you can view the LCD screen over a surprisingly wide angle—above, below or to either side—without color shifts and with minimal reflections. A scratch-proof hard coating and a dust-repellent fluorine coating ensure a durable screen that dependably displays clear, vibrant images.

Smart AUTO
Smart AUTO for the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS has been significantly expanded, making it easier than ever to capture the sharp, bright, colorful images—and videos—you’re looking for. By assessing various factors in both the background and the subject, the system recognizes 58 predefined shooting situations and automatically selects the camera settings that will yield the best possible results. Simply frame the shot you want, and in dozens of common or challenging scenarios the camera takes care of the rest. Hard-to-capture shots such as moving subjects, night scenes, backlit subjects, and landscapes at evening or on a bright snowy day are instantly and effortlessly captured as “keeper” shots. Smart AUTO makes the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS ideal for capturing excellent quality still images and video on the go. 




Smart AUTO The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity. Program 
The camera automatically and intelligently selects the aperture/shutter speed combination based on the shooting conditions. Movie Digest in 720p HD Records a video clip in 720p HD before capturing a still image and then combines one day’s worth of clips into a video.
Stitch Assist 
Easy-to-use guidelines simplify the shooting of aligned multiple frames that can later be combined (using bundled software) to create panoramic photos. Low Light 
For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly-lit situations. Portrait Brings the subject into focus while beautifully blurring the background. Smart Shutter 
The camera automatically takes the photo when people smile, wink, or get into frame. High-Speed Burst Captures rapid action frame by frame, by shooting continuously at a high speed while the shutter is held down. Handheld Night Scene Take clear and steady pictures at night without the use of a tripod. Super Vivid 
Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors. Color Accent Choose to retain a single color in your image while other colors turn monochrome. Color Swap 
Select a color and replace it with a color you specify for special effects. Underwater Capture underwater images with reduced backscatter effect. Optional Underwater Case required. Snow 
Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint. Long Shutter Use to blur moving subjects for artistic effect, ideal for urban night photography. Fisheye Effect Now you can get the fisheye effect — a classic photographic distortion — without a fisheye lens. Miniature Effect 
Give images a miniature look with an effect that emphasizes perspective by blurring the top and bottom of the image. Toy Camera Effect 
Simulates photos taken with “toy” or pinhole cameras, darkening the image at the edges to create a vignette effect. Monochrome Choose from three single-tone effects: Black-and-White, Sepia, or Blue. Poster Effect 
Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts. iFrame Movie The Apple® movie format, iFrame, makes it easier and quicker to import and upload videos while retaining high image quality. Super Slow Motion Movie 
Record your clips in high speed (approx. 240 fps), and then watch your videos in slow motion. Smooth Skin Removes dullness, wrinkles, and harsh shadows for beautiful faces. Soft Focus Creates a hazy ambiance that’s perfect for portraits and wedding photos. 

Face ID
Face ID is one of the most advanced and exciting new features of the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS, giving you an easy way to improve every shot of the people you love. Simply take a picture of up to 12 faces you would like the camera to register, then enter names and ages. Once a person is registered, the camera will pick him or her out of a group (even against a busy background) and adjust focus and exposure to his or her face, even recognizing faces in profile. Face ID is particularly great for shots of babies and children. The system can pick your baby out of a group of children, focus on your baby when pictured with an adult, and capture her best smile by taking three successive images when the smile is detected. The flash is even disabled so as not to startle the baby and interrupt the moment. Older children in motion are tracked, with focus and exposure continually adjusted with Servo AF; with one shutter press three successive images are captured so the best shot is never missed. And because you’ll identify each face you register, Face ID makes it easy to search images by name. 

Intelligent IS
The latest advance in Canon Optical Image Stabilization technology, Intelligent IS analyzes camera movement and applies the best shake correction method for the shooting situation. For stills, the system automatically selects among Normal, Panning, Macro (Hybrid) and Tripod IS modes. When shooting video, the system automatically selects among Dynamic, Powered, Macro and Tripod IS modes. With Intelligent IS, you can concentrate on image capture, letting the camera make the most effective IS settings to assure the steadiest possible image.

Normal
Corrects for a wide range of camera movement when shooting stills. Panning
Panning motion is detected so that IS does not interfere with desired camera movement. Hybrid
Corrects for shift-type camera shake, which typically occurs in macro (close-up) shooting. Dynamic
Effective for video shooting at wide-angle focal lengths, eliminating the unwanted shaking that typically occurs while walking. Powered
Compensates for hand movement when shooting video at the telephoto end of the zoom range, where camera shake is magnified. Tripod
When tripod use is detected, the Image Stabilizer is stopped because it is not needed. 

High-Speed Burst Mode
Capture amazing action shots like the pros with the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS camera. Using High-Speed Burst mode,* you can shoot at exceptionally high speeds—5.8 frames per second. It’s a great feature for those who enjoy taking pictures at sporting events. High-Speed Burst is also an excellent way to make sure you capture that perfect instant in time when shooting any moving subject.

*Image resolution is 2304 x 1728 pixels when shooting in High-Speed Burst mode.

Super Slow Motion
The Super Slow Motion Movie mode* on the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS gives you a fun and useful option when shooting videos. It records video clips at a very high speed—up to approximately 240 frames per second. When the clips are played at normal speed (30 fps), the action is dramatically slower. This video shooting mode can be used to capture memorable plays at sporting events or to analyze and study motion. 

*Records 640 x 480 pixels at 120 fps and 320 x 420 pixels at 240 fps.

Turn Your Memories into a Highlights Reel with 720p Movie Digest
With the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS digital camera, capturing trips and special occasions with a high-quality video “highlights reel” is as easy as switching on the Movie Digest feature. When activated, the feature automatically records the four seconds before each still shot as video, then auto-edits them into a short movie. Played back together, the video clips capture the mood and ambiance of special days in a way that’s completely different from still images, both documenting the creation of still images and providing a unique stand-alone memory preserver. New with the PowerShot ELPH 110 HS, the video is captured in 720p high definition so that it looks smooth and beautifully detailed when played back on your HDTV. With bundled software ImageBrowser EX, you can easily delete any scenes you don’t want. 

New Smooth Skin and Soft Focus Scene Modes
The PowerShot ELPH 110 HS makes it easier than ever to give your images a professional look with new scene modes that instantly mimic the effects of post-production editing and special filters. Smooth Skin takes away dullness, fine wrinkles and harsh shadows, subtly smoothing and brightening skin for beautiful faces. Smooth Skin Effect can be set to Low, Medium or High; Skin Tone Color can be set to Off, Lighter Skin Tone or Darker Skin Tone to counteract shadows and improve visibility. Soft Focus creates a hazy ambiance that’s perfect for nostalgic portraits, romantic shots, wedding photos and more. The mode can be set to Low, Medium or High for just the right effect.

 1. PowerShot ELPH 100 HS Digital Camera
 2. Battery Pack NB-11L
 3. Battery Charger CB-2LD
 4. USB Interface Cable IFC-400PCU
 5. Wrist Strap WS-800
 6. Digita Camera Solution CD-Rom
